Comment:
As a witness to said JSPWiki rollout I can vouch for it’s greatness… inspired I went on to install two at my next place of work – together with all sorts of nifty plugs-ins.

I’m using an old alpha, I tried to upgrade to the latest version (3 times actually) but that just ended up with late nights rolling back.
